body:
I don't have much experience with TIFF, or have many of them lying around on my filesystem, but in general I'd start with doing what the spec says instead of being liberal. On the other hand, if there are real-world non-spec-compliant TIFF images out there, and libtiff accepts them, then I'm happy for TIFF in practice to trump TIFF in specification.

In either case, as I said, I don't have a lot of TIFF experience, so I'll defer the decision to @bsiegert.
